thread.title: After Senate Dems Vow to Oppose SCOTUS Nominee, Look What Mike Pence Does to Them…
thread.title_full: After Senate Dems Vow to Oppose SCOTUS Nominee, Look What Mike Pence Does to Them…

author: John S. Roberts
title: After Senate Dems Vow to Oppose SCOTUS Nominee, Look What Mike Pence Does to Them…
text:
Colorado Judge Neil Gorsuch will be a Supreme Court justice. 
The “nuclear option” is very much on the table if Democrats continue to obstruct. 
Back in 2006, the Columbia/Harvard/Oxford educated jurist was easily confirmed in the Senate after being nominated by Dubya for the 10th Circuit Court of Appeals. 
This time around will be much different because libs will choose to play politics just for the hell of it. 
Enter Vice President Mike Pence, who is not pleased with Senate Dems at the moment… 
Vice President Mike Pence slammed Senate Democrats during a speech at the Federalist Society in Philadelphia on Saturday for vowing to oppose President Donald Trump’s Supreme Court nominee Neil Gorsuch. 
… 
“Several [Democrats] announced their opposition within minutes of his nomination, and now they’re even threatening to use the filibuster procedure in the Senate to stop him,” Pence said. “Make no mistake about it, this is an unwise and an unprecedented act.” 
“Never before in the history of our country has an associate justice nominee to the Supreme Court faced a successful filibuster,” Pence explained to applause. “And Judge Neil M. Gorsuch should not be the first.” 
Pence went on to say that he and Trump have “full confidence” that Gorsuch will be confirmed, while explaining that the Trump administration will ensure that Gorsuch receives an up-or-down vote on the Senate floor “one way or the other,” alluding to the nuclear option. 
Gorsuch’s record is undeniably impeccable, which is what scares the left. 
He’s conservative. He’s a traditionalist. He’s a textualist. He’s an originalist. 
Basically, he’s a proud American who doesn’t believe the constitution is a living, breathing document. 
The nerve of the guy! LIKE this article?
